mapper.insert: insert into portfolio(artist_no, title, type, file, content, reg_date, agree, thumbnail, artist_name, artist_profile_img) VALUES (#{artist_no}, #{title}, #{type}, #{file}, #{content}, now(), #{agree}, #{thumbnail}, #{artist_name}, #{artist_profile_img})
mapper.update: update portfolio SET title=#{title}, content=#{content}, revise_date=now() WHERE portfolio_no=#{portfolio_no}
update portfolio SET comment_number = #{comment_number} WHERE portfolio_no=#{portfolio_no}
update portfolio SET like_number = #{like_number} WHERE portfolio_no=#{portfolio_no}
update portfolio SET visit_number=#{visit_number} WHERE portfolio_no=#{portfolio_no}
mapper.select: select * from portfolio order by RAND() limit 5
select * from portfolio WHERE title like #{query} or artist_name like #{query} LIMIT 15
